name: Floating Garden
description:
For one of my Individual Student Activities I decided to make a FSM. For this FSM I wanted to make a simple little game where you can place tents and have workers gathering resources.

Eventually I decided to just make it into a showcase of my FSM in action. There is NO ACTUAL GAMEPLAY. You can fly around and look at the Workers doing their job on a cute little floating Island I made.

Source Code:
https://github.com/JaydeeAlkema

The entire development of this game can be found on my Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoY12tD2MzKx260XkMlKEnyelCN_yV_u9

The development of this game was live streamed at:
https://www.twitch.tv/zejaydee
